Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use the nomos system Skill to control your smart and IoT devices with just the sound of your voice. It is as easy as asking Alexa to turn outlets and lights on or off, adjust dimmers, turn on or off Sonos speakers, set connected thermostats and much more.. 

Please note that it is essential that you own a preconfigured nomos Controller to use this skill or it will not work.

To get started, you first need to create a free account on our nomos cloud and link it with your nomos Controller. Then select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to authorize your nomos cloud account and you are ready to talk.

When using the skill, you can specify a defined scene or trigger a specific task for your home - here are some of our favorites things to talk about:
“Alexa, set the living room to 22 degrees”
"Alexa, turn on living room Sonos”
"Alexa, turn on good morning”
